alert.note: Alert for Vernon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 15 at 4:15PM CDT until June 15 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN VERNON COUNTY... At 415 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Hillsboro, or 20 miles north of Richland Center, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Hillsboro around 420 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Trippville, Bartons Corners, Mount Tabor, Highway 82 And County A, Valley, Dilly and White City. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
